'''Berserker's Battle Mask''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Berserker]].

==Description==
Bathed in the flames that devoured his homeland, the berserker's face was no longer recognizable.<br>The iron mask became joined with his flesh, permanently branding his face with a heartless countenance.<br>Then, in a fierce battle, his horrifying mask was split into two by his opponent.<br>The cracks of the mask tore apart the flesh that had long stuck to it.<br>But neither pain nor blood could stop the berserker's unfaltering footsteps.<br>The berserker kept roaring until the fresh blood covered the black clots hardened on his face.
